description: The first group, after the huge orgy, was exhausted so they tagged out and switched with the second wave of guys. These guys had a different kind of chemistry. Where the first group was more like a frat, these guys all had a really solid sexual attraction to each other so it was a totally different experience. For Day 7, Porter sneaks off with Atticus and fucks him outside for a bit until they decide to go warm up and find Brendan. These three fuck and really dominate Atticus and have a great time while doing it.
title: Winter Getaway: Day 7
